title: Chapter 1270 - Deng Zuo’S Understanding
body:
Chapter 1270 - Deng Zuo’S Understanding

Deng Zuo was overcome with fury, but he wasn’t the only one.

Everyone in the Primordial Unity Daoist Sect felt—and looked—as if they’d swallowed a dead fly.

They’d watched people get ripped off before, but never this ruthlessly!

Su Yi laughed and said leisurely, “You don’t want to negotiate anymore?”

Deng Zuo glared at Su Yi for a long time before gnashing his teeth. “Speak!”

Su Yi couldn’t help but find this surprising. The old-timer’s actually just taking it?

Su Yi said thoughtfully, “From the look of things, no matter how outrageous my demands, you’ll agree to anything I ask for. Is that right?”

Deng Zuo was so furious that he laughed. “Temple Master, oh, Temple Master. If you don’t want to negotiate, just say so! Although I don’t wish to see our enmity implicate my sect’s juniors, if you insist on casting aside all pretenses of cordiality, I’ll set my reservations aside too!”

His voice was already full of unconcealable anger.

Su Yi laughed dryly. “Very well. I’ll give you face, you old charlatan. Answer one of my questions, and today’s incident is over.”

Deng Zuo was obviously surprised. Some time passed before he said, “Please ask directly.”

Su Yi said, “Why are you putting up with my demands?”

It was a...
